mapper.select: SELECT p.product_name, os.order_sell_idx, COUNT(os.product_idx) AS cnt FROM order_sell os left join product p ON os.product_idx = p.product_idx GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY cnt DESC, order_sell_idx LIMIT 5;

SELECT i.image_real_file1, os.order_sell_idx, COUNT(os.product_idx) AS cnt FROM order_sell os left join image i ON os.product_idx = i.product_idx GROUP BY image_real_file1 ORDER BY cnt DESC, order_sell_idx LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.product_name, ob.order_buy_idx, SUM(ob.order_buy_count) AS cnt FROM order_buy ob left join product p ON ob.product_idx = p.product_idx GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY cnt DESC, order_buy_idx LIMIT 5;
SELECT i.image_real_file1, ob.order_buy_idx, SUM(ob.order_buy_count) AS cnt FROM order_buy ob left join image i ON ob.product_idx = i.product_idx GROUP BY image_real_file1 ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.product_type, round(count(p.product_type) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_buy) * 100,0) AS cnt FROM order_buy ob LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON ob.product_idx = p.product_idx GROUP BY p.product_type;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_buy_date,'%y-%m') date, sum(order_buy_price) * 0.02 as sales_buy FROM order_buy GROUP BY date ORDER BY date;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_sell_date,'%y-%m') date, sum(p.product_sell_price) * 0.02 as sales_sell FROM order_sell os LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON os.product_idx = p.product_idx GROUP BY date ORDER BY date;
